description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has hijacked legitimate application-specific startup scripts to enable malware to execute on system startup.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)

external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22
